summary: Explore the tomb of Zandak, poisoner of kings, and retrieve his mighty bane.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a new nordic dungeon in the mountains south of Riften. In it, you will face many dangers, including Zandak the Poisoner. If you succeed in killing him, you will be rewarded with his mighty sword: Zandak's Bane.

Zandak's Bane is a unique Akaviri Sword that has an enchantment of 30 Shock Damage + Half Magicka Damage.
author: Smike
